Name: Pixel Forge
Description: Pixel Forge was once the pinnacle of 8-bit gaming, ushering in a golden era with his laser screen and retro console aesthetics. With arms and legs forged in the digital foundries of old, he wielded a pixelated hammer and glitched fork with legendary precision. Known for crafting pixel-perfect worlds and characters, he became a living legend in the WebtrES club. However, after the rise of next-gen graphics, Pixel Forge disappeared into the realm of forgotten heroes. Rumors whisper of a secret level where he hones his craft, waiting to reboot an era where pixels ruled supreme.
